# naoutils: R package with helper functions for the NAO Team

Install from within R using the
[remotes](https://github.com/r-lib/remotes) package.

From GitHub:

``` r
# install.packages('remotes')
remotes::install_github('naobservatory/rpkg-naoutils')
```

From a local copy of this repo:

``` r
remotes::install_local('path/to/rpkg-naoutils')
```

# Package index

## Import qPCR results

- [`read_qpcr_amplification_csv()`](https://naobservatory.github.io/rpkg-naoutils/reference/read_qpcr_amplification_csv.md)
  : Read qPCR 'Amplification Data' table from a CSV file
- [`read_qpcr_results_csv()`](https://naobservatory.github.io/rpkg-naoutils/reference/read_qpcr_results_csv.md)
  : Read qPCR 'Results' or 'Standard Curve Result' table from a CSV file
- [`clean_common()`](https://naobservatory.github.io/rpkg-naoutils/reference/clean_common.md)
  : Cleaning operation applied to results and amplification csv files

## Import Kraken results

- [`kraken_add_taxonomy()`](https://naobservatory.github.io/rpkg-naoutils/reference/kraken_add_taxonomy.md)
  : Add full taxonomy path to a Kraken report data frame
- [`kraken_complete()`](https://naobservatory.github.io/rpkg-naoutils/reference/kraken_complete.md)
  : Complete a set of Kraken reports by filling in zero counts (Not
  tested!)
- [`kraken_remove_nonstandard_ranks()`](https://naobservatory.github.io/rpkg-naoutils/reference/kraken_remove_nonstandard_ranks.md)
  : Remove nonstandard ranks from Kraken reports
- [`read_kraken_reports()`](https://naobservatory.github.io/rpkg-naoutils/reference/read_kraken_reports.md)
  : Read one or more Kraken2 sample reports
